p: Results of covalent plasma and under development vaccines soon will indicate the value of these methods. Also, a new method is growing, Vanessa Monteil et al. ( https://www.cell.com/pb-assets/products/coronavirus/CELL_CELL-D-20-00739.pdf), indicated that SARS-CoV-2 spike protein straightly binds to ACE2 and they showed that the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein identifies human ACE2 with higher binding affinity than Spike from SARS-CoV.
